text: @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgencyMids Water had already started to enter the road prior to the warning, so we were a little confused as to what was going on. Hope that makes sense.
@DaveThroupEA @EnvAgencyMids Gloucester was now going to peak at the levels Sandhurst was expecting and that Sandhurst was going to peak at the levels that had been suggested at Gloucester.

@DaveThroupEA @EnvAgencyMids Thanks for replying Dave. For the last couple of days the forecast had suggested Gloucester levels would be higher than at Sandhurst which we thought was odd. We just got a flood warning and checked the predictions, which appeared to show that..

text:
Locals, #councillors and #MPs must shout loudly about this neglect, and check every year that @EnvAgency
warnings and recommendations are actioned. If not, more #floods will lead to more #misery and #expense. A stitch in time saves nine!

Tough weekend due to floods, but our RDC staff are still smiling! Thank you to everyone on the ground this weekend, especially @ryedaledc staff @EnvAgencyYNE @NorthYorksFire @YorkshireWater.
